title: Night at Museum
description: Visitor Studies Research Project at Melbourne Museum exploring how night programs affect visitor experience. Conducting field research through structured observation and interviews to analyze visitor behavior during after-hours programming.

title: Sensitive Being Exhibition
description: Co-curating a group exhibition exploring sensory and emotional experience, featuring artists from Australia, China, Argentina, and the U.S. Responsible for artist open call, venue arrangements, and display planning.

title: Creative Collective Series
description: Leading recurring community workshops on home gallery curation, collaborative art-making, and art therapy. Built a diverse cultural exchange community of 200+ members.
